APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.DIRECT_INVESTMENTS: Direct investments (bonds, certificates, equities, structured products, etc.) domiciled outside Zone A of the OECD and not listed on a financial market approved by the CAA are not admissible. NL
APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.ALTERNATIVE_INVESTMENTS: Alternative investments’ (hedge funds, commodity funds, private equity, real estate funds, etc.) liquidity must be at least semi-annual for type A&B dedicated funds, and annual for type C dedicated funds. NL
APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.FUTURES_OPTIONS: Futures, options, forwards, swaps are permitted for hedging purposes only if the underlying assets are held within the portfolio. Otherwise they are not permitted for speculative purposes. All derivative type contracts must be settled in cash. Investment in contracts permitting holding or physical delivery of a commodity (i.e. physical metals, art, wine, etc.) is not permitted. NL
APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.CB_THE_POLICYHOLDER_CONFIRMS: The policyholder confirms that he accepts and understands the rules regarding admissible investments and the risks associated with holding cash, time deposits and foreign currency investments. NL
APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.THE_POLICYHOLDER_DECLARES: The policyholder declares that he is aware that the investment strategy which he has chosen and confirmed does not fit his risk profile as defined in the section "Suitability of the investment". Notwithstanding this, the policyholder confirms that he has understood the risks linked to his chosen investment strategy and confirms that he wants to invest according to this strategy, which derogates from but does not change his risk profile
APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.IT_IS_MANDATORY: It is mandatory to complete the minimum and maximum investment limits  below for the chosen investment strategy and other mandates. NL
APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.FIXED: Fixed income (Direct investment only & structured products) NL
APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.MINIMUM_VALUE: Minimum value should be less than or equal to NL
APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.MAXIMUM_VALUE: Maximum value should be greater than or equal to NL
APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.EQUITIES: Equities (Direct investment only & structured products) NL
APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.INVESTMENT_FUNDS: Investment funds (Including fund of funds) NL
APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.ALTERNATIVE: Alternative funds (including fund of funds) NL
APP_PROCESS_CHARGES.CB_CURRENT: Current/Deposit at notice/Time deposit accounts NL

COMMON_LOCALIZATION_DATA.MANDATORY_FIELD: Fields marked with a '*' are mandatory NL
COMMON_LOCALIZATION_DATA.P_A_OF_THE_VALUE_OF_DEDICATED: per jaar van de waarde van het toegewezen fonds, rechtstreeks afgehouden van het fonds.
COMMON_LOCALIZATION_DATA.PARAGRAPH_THE_INVESTMENT_1: De beleggingslimieten van toepassing op levensverzekeringscontracten die verbonden zijn aan beleggingsfondsen zijn gedefinieerd door het Commissariat aux Assurances in de gecoördineerde versie van de circulaire LC 15/3, met betrekking tot de beleggingsregels voor levensverzekeringsproducten verbonden aan beleggingsfondsen, e raadplegen op de website:
COMMON_LOCALIZATION_DATA.PARAGRAPH_THE_INVESTMENT_2: of verkrijgbaar bij Swiss Life op eenvoudig verzoek.

APP_PROCESS_ALLOCATION.FORM_TITLE: SECTION 5 – INVESTMENT OF THE CONTRACT NL
